refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GLib type system provides fundamental types for enumeration and flags types. (Flags types are like enumerations, but allow their values to be combined by bitwise or). A registered enumeration or flags type associates a name and a nickname with each allowed value, and the methods g_enum_get_value_by_name(), g_enum_get_value_by_nick(), g_flags_get_value_by_name() and g_flags_get_value_by_nick() can look up values by their name or nickname. When an enumeration or flags type is registered with the GLib type system, it can be used as value type for object properties, using g_param_spec_enum() or g_param_spec_flags().
GObject ships with a utility called glib-mkenums, that can construct suitable type registration functions from C enumeration definitions.
Example of how to get a string representation of an enum value:

refsect2.title: G_ENUM_CLASS_TYPE()
refsect2.para: Get the type identifier from a given GEnumClass structure.

refsect2.title: G_ENUM_CLASS_TYPE_NAME()
refsect2.para: Get the static type name from a given GEnumClass structure.

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_IS_ENUM()
refsect2.para: Checks whether type "is a" G_TYPE_ENUM.

refsect2.title: G_ENUM_CLASS()
refsect2.para: Casts a derived GEnumClass structure into a GEnumClass structure.

refsect2.title: G_IS_ENUM_CLASS()
refsect2.para: Checks whether class "is a" valid GEnumClass structure of type G_TYPE_ENUM or derived.

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_IS_FLAGS()
refsect2.para: Checks whether type "is a" G_TYPE_FLAGS.

refsect2.title: G_FLAGS_CLASS()
refsect2.para: Casts a derived GFlagsClass structure into a GFlagsClass structure.

refsect2.title: G_IS_FLAGS_CLASS()
refsect2.para: Checks whether class "is a" valid GFlagsClass structure of type G_TYPE_FLAGS or derived.

refsect2.title: G_FLAGS_CLASS_TYPE()
refsect2.para: Get the type identifier from a given GFlagsClass structure.

refsect2.title: G_FLAGS_CLASS_TYPE_NAME()
refsect2.para: Get the static type name from a given GFlagsClass structure.

refsect2.title: g_enum_get_value ()
refsect2.para: Returns the GEnumValue for a value.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GEnumValue for value , or NULL if value is not a member of the enumeration.

refsect2.title: g_enum_get_value_by_name ()
refsect2.para: Looks up a GEnumValue by name.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GEnumValue with name name , or NULL if the enumeration doesn't have a member with that name.

refsect2.title: g_enum_get_value_by_nick ()
refsect2.para: Looks up a GEnumValue by nickname.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GEnumValue with nickname nick , or NULL if the enumeration doesn't have a member with that nickname.

refsect2.title: g_enum_to_string ()
refsect2.para: Pretty-prints value in the form of the enumâ€™s name.
This is intended to be used for debugging purposes. The format of the output may change in the future.

entry.para: the type identifier of a GEnumClass type

refsect2.para: Since: 2.54

refsect2.title: g_flags_get_first_value ()
refsect2.para: Returns the first GFlagsValue which is set in value .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the first GFlagsValue which is set in value , or NULL if none is set.

refsect2.title: g_flags_get_value_by_name ()
refsect2.para: Looks up a GFlagsValue by name.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GFlagsValue with name name , or NULL if there is no flag with that name.

refsect2.title: g_flags_get_value_by_nick ()
refsect2.para: Looks up a GFlagsValue by nickname.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GFlagsValue with nickname nick , or NULL if there is no flag with that nickname.

refsect2.title: g_flags_to_string ()
refsect2.para: Pretty-prints value in the form of the flag names separated by | and sorted. Any extra bits will be shown at the end as a hexadecimal number.
This is intended to be used for debugging purposes. The format of the output may change in the future.

entry.para: the type identifier of a GFlagsClass type

refsect2.para: Since: 2.54

refsect2.title: g_enum_register_static ()
refsect2.para: Registers a new static enumeration type with the name name .
It is normally more convenient to let glib-mkenums, generate a my_enum_get_type() function from a usual C enumeration definition than to write one yourself using g_enum_register_static().

entry.para: A nul-terminated string used as the name of the new type.

An array of GEnumValue structs for the possible enumeration values. The array is terminated by a struct with all members being 0. GObject keeps a reference to the data, so it cannot be stack-allocated.

refsect2.title: g_flags_register_static ()
refsect2.para: Registers a new static flags type with the name name .
It is normally more convenient to let glib-mkenums generate a my_flags_get_type() function from a usual C enumeration definition than to write one yourself using g_flags_register_static().

entry.para: A nul-terminated string used as the name of the new type.
An array of GFlagsValue structs for the possible flags values. The array is terminated by a struct with all members being 0. GObject keeps a reference to the data, so it cannot be stack-allocated.

refsect2.title: g_enum_complete_type_info ()
refsect2.programlisting: void g_enum_complete_type_info (GType g_enum_type, GTypeInfo *info, const GEnumValue *const_values);
refsect2.para: This function is meant to be called from the complete_type_info function of a GTypePlugin implementation, as in the following example:

entry.para: the type identifier of the type being completed
the GTypeInfo struct to be filled in.
An array of GEnumValue structs for the possible enumeration values. The array is terminated by a struct with all members being 0.

refsect2.title: g_flags_complete_type_info ()
refsect2.programlisting: void g_flags_complete_type_info (GType g_flags_type, GTypeInfo *info, const GFlagsValue *const_values);
refsect2.para: This function is meant to be called from the complete_type_info() function of a GTypePlugin implementation, see the example for g_enum_complete_type_info() above.

entry.para: the type identifier of the type being completed
the GTypeInfo struct to be filled in.
An array of GFlagsValue structs for the possible enumeration values. The array is terminated by a struct with all members being 0.

refsect2.title: struct GEnumClass
refsect2.para: The class of an enumeration type holds information about its possible values.

entry.para: an array of GEnumValue structs describing the individual values.

refsect2.title: struct GFlagsClass
refsect2.para: The class of a flags type holds information about its possible values.

entry.para: a mask covering all possible values.
an array of GFlagsValue structs describing the individual values.

refsect2.title: struct GEnumValue
refsect2.para: A structure which contains a single enum value, its name, and its nickname.

refsect2.title: struct GFlagsValue
refsect2.para: A structure which contains a single flags value, its name, and its nickname.
